Room.Name: Circular Well
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on a narrow ledge, with no hand-holds, in a circular well.
Room.LongDescription: The air is cool and damp, and far below you can hear the sound of water dripping into a larger pool of water. Must be condensation. Although the ledge is narrow and difficult to traverse, you are fortunate there are a lot of rough stones for your hands.
